product_name: REI Mini Travel Surge Protector with Dual USB Ports
long_description: The REI Mini Travel Surge Protector with Dual USB provides two outlets and two USB ports. It charges your smartphone, MP3 player, iPad(R) and tablet while protecting them from electrical surges. Full surge protection up to 900V / 1800W; green LED light indicates that the surge protection is working. USB charges up to 5V / 2.1A. Electrical rating: 15A 120V, 60Hz, 1800W. REI Mini Travel Surge Protector features a grounded plug that folds flat and out of the way.
short_description: The REI Mini Travel Surge Protector with Dual USB provides two outlets and two USB ports. It charges your smartphone, MP3 player, iPad(R) and tablet while protecting them from electrical surges.
